credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Waistcoat
description: Cream-white taffeta waistcoat embroidered in multi-colored silks using chain stitch. Legend of the Fox and the Crow across bottom and pocket flap. Sprays of flowers on buttonholes. Late 18th century style waistcoat with a straight bottom and standing collar. Narrow silk fringe edges on front and collar. Twelve buttons.
name: Waistcoat
